title: Turning 18
creator_credit: Tony Wright, Peter Kaufman, Penny Robins, Open Channel Productions and Video Projects
brief_description: An amusing look at some serious issues that are related to turning eighteen - the age by which a person is legally recognised as an adult in this society. This program, subtitled, “Almost 20 Minutes” is a parody of the current affairs television program, “60 Minutes”.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Wright, Peter Kaufman, Penny Robins, Open Channel Productions and Video Projects
